message: Let's split it evenly!  Fair is fair, right?
The money is worth less to you in each round, so I think I deserve a bit more!
Okay, I'll give you a bit more. But this is my final offer - I'm not budging any more!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to take the risk. The money is still worth the same to me, and I think I can get a better deal!
You know, I'm starting to think you're right. Let's just get this over with, and I'll take what I can get.
